title: KHR_materials_sheen glTF extension
description: glTF extension that defines the sheen material model.

intensityFactor.gltf_detailedDescription: The sheen layer intensity of the material. A value of 0.0 means the material has no sheen layer enabled.

colorFactor.description: Color of the sheen layer (in linear space).

colorIntensityTexture.gltf_detailedDescription: The sheen layer texture. Stored in channel RGB the sheen color in sRGB transfer function and in A the linear factor.

roughnessFactor.gltf_detailedDescription: The sheen layer roughness of the material.
